text.en: In the dharmakāya realm of Samantabhadra, you are the Great Mother,
text.en-trans: chöku kunzang zhing na yum chenmo

text.en: In the saṃbhogakāya fields of the five families, you are Vajravārāhī,
text.en-trans: longku rik ngé zhing na varahi

text.en: The nirmāṇakāya Shelkar Dorje Tso, consort of the Lotus-born—
text.en-trans: tulku pejung tab chok shelkar tso

text.en: Khyentse’s ḍākinī, Tsering Chödrön, Long-life Lamp of Dharma.
text.en-trans: khyentsé daki tsering chö kyi drön

text.en: And Vajradhara in person, Lord Chökyi Lodrö,
text.en-trans: dorjé chang ngö chökyi lodrö jé

text.en: Glorious and noble lama, together with your consort—
May all your enlightened wishes, without exception, be fulfilled,
text.en-trans: tuk kyi zhedön malü yongdzok né

text.en: And grant your blessings, so that we may never be apart!
text.en-trans: dak sok dralwa mepar jingyi lob
